title: TFR Ep. 581: Red Notice, Finch, 2021 Holiday Gift Guide
description:
This week on The First Run, Chris and Matt discuss the Netflix blockbuster, per Netflix, ‘Red Notice’.  Featuring 3 of today’s biggest stars!  Has a new action franchise been born?  And is that a good thing?  Then AppleTV+ has their own premiere, featuring America’s Dad, Tom Hanks in a heart-warming tale about the apocalypse.  It’s ‘Finch’!  There’s the deliriously entertaining rundown of the big releases on Physical Media, featuring the Straight to DVD and Streaming Picks of the Week!  Then it’s one of Matt’s favorite segments we do, our 2021 Holiday Gift Guide for the movie lover in your life.  Or you.

00:00-13:23: Intro/Red Notice

13:24-22:48: Physical Media Picks

22:49-26:52: Spider-Man No Way Home Trailer

26:53-35:01: Finch

35:02-48:48: 2021 Holiday Gift Guide

48:49-49:20: Wrap Up

Theme music by Jamal Malachi Ford-Bey

Twitter

Instagram

Facebook

And is that a good thing?  Then AppleTV+ has their own premiere, featuring America’s Dad, Tom Hanks in a heart-warming tale about the apocalypse.  It’s ‘Finch’!  There’s the deliriously entertaining rundown of the big releases on Physical Media, featuring the Straight to DVD and Streaming Picks of the Week!
